Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here's the table you requested:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| tandem |
| single junction |

The "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. Tandem
2. Single junction

Note that "tandem" and "single junction" are not materials per se but rather structures or configurations of materials. However, they are still valid entities in the context of the paragraph, as they describe the types of solar cells being referred to.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| single junction |

The only valid "Material Name" entity in the given paragraph is "single junction". "Tandem" is not a material name, but rather a structure or configuration of materials.

Paragraph: 1 To date , solar power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) of 10.6% and 9.2% have been demonstrated in the cells with tandem and single junction structures , respectively , representing an important advance in the development of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

```
| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10.6% |
| 9.2% |
```
The two property values mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. 10.6% - the solar power conversion efficiency demonstrated in cells with tandem junction structures.
2. 9.2% - the solar power conversion efficiency demonstrated in cells with single junction structures.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
